message: Someone who isn't me, and I forgot their name, used to sell steroids to about a dozen cops... their rationale was that, because they aren't mind-altering, they aren't harmful drugs... yeah okay.. fucking with your hormones and getting all aggro couldn't possibly go wrong in that line of work.... They were mostly short, white guys that were deathly afraid of big black men. I lived in a small southern city where the population was about 50/50 white/black and the black people still lived on the other side of the railroad tracks.
